channel.title: ::newtag Command
channel.description: hey everyone, i Want it so when you type ::newtag (Text here) It gives you a custom Yell tag, is there anyway i can do this. 1 more thing, I would like it so when you you use the command it takes away 1 DungeonPoints from you.... so say you have zero DungeonPoints then it says"sorry you do not have enough dungeon points" but if u have above 0 it says "Thank you you yell tag is now[There clan tag here]!! Thanks!!!

can u show me how?
